It's a really good game and is worth the money spent while playing (for DLCs and in-game content). There's definitely a toxic community within Dead by Daylight and you'll most likely realize that the more you play, but if you ignore the toxicity and just enjoy the game for what it actually has to offer, it's fun and shows to be a challenge when necessary. I do wish that reporting a player for being toxic would actually mean something - it really doesn't. So it's best to ignore most players who find it "funny" to be rude to anyone playing DbD. I hope this review helps some people make a decision when it comes to buying this game.

DBD is a high-stakes game of hide-and-go-seek from a terrifying killer! Or it's the relentless pursuit of cunning prey as a powerful creature! The game starts pretty scary - your heart will be racing - as you run, hide and complete objectives to escape as the killer stalks you! As you play more, the scariness wears down but you're never fully safe from a jumpscare! The game is consistently fun and exciting.

You may become so skilled that you look forward to the killer chasing you, you have mastered the art of stealth or you can predict what all four survivors are doing at once before striking them down one by one. It's basically scary capture the flag and hide and go seek. If you play(ed) those outside as a kid you'll dig DBD.

There are issues of course:
- the connection/hit registration isn't always great, so you get hit - or miss - more often. 

- Sometimes matchmaking is unbalanced, leading to painful stomps of one side or the other. Sometimes you wait long queue for that pleasure!

- You spend a lot of time in the lobby or menus improving your characters and creating 'loadouts' - more time than you think you should because there's a TON of UX that feels slows. Click/hold decisions (bloodwebs), loading screens, menu-change animations dividing too many menus. But there's unfortunately always other bugs to address...

- Some players will choose pretty annoying playstyles like only going after one survivor or taunting and continually sabotaging a killer as a skilled survivor.

Even still, the game is just a blast! Take breaks though - it is a game about terrifyingly cruel killers murdering people :O

8/10 - I absolutely recommend giving it a shot, especially if you can survive with some friends (take any frustrations out on other survivors as killer later :)!

Is the game fun? It is very fun to me. Is it perfect? No, however it's one of my favorite asymmetrical games.
Dead by Daylight has lots of good stuff, and I'd definitely recommend it to my friends.  It's one of the most fun games I can enjoy with my friends. That thrill of being either the killer or a survivor is just the perfect kind of rush for games. When the fear goes away, there's still that comical goofy fun players can still have. I'd have to warn them that they need a good computer. It is literally impossible to play it on an average laptop; I speak from experience.

What are the downsides? The top flaw would have to be the matching system. It's such a pain when amateur killers are stuck getting seasoned pros or vice versa, but at the same time it makes the game that much more surprising and thrilling.
Like this flaw, I can view the brightside of all the other problems I find in this game, which are few.

Even after I experience all the content, I plan to keep playing casually every now and then. If it wasn't for the massive download required to play the game, I'd redownload it all the time when I felt in the mood for a month of DbD.

Summary: Great game, worth it. Don't get the DLCs unless you're sure you like the game, and watch out for the toxic players.

good.
VERY FUN

What can I say about DBD. It's an amazing game that is amazing with friends. I recommend avoiding the higher ranks if you want to have more fun.

The Good:
Dynamic Gameplay
Both sides are engaging
Amazing with friends

The Bad:
Core gameplay can get repetitive
Voice comms can make or break the game
The forums and high ranks are a nightmare. Avoid at all costs!

All in all I highly recommend picking it up as it has drained me of many hours and I keep coming back for more!

Otherwise playing survivor without any friends is the most boring and scary bullshit ever thought up by a game creator.

Hours played at time of writing-1.8k hours
DBD is an amazing game (my all time favourite) where every match is as unique and, for the most part, as fun as the next! Many unique killers and maps make the game interesting to play and to rotate between the varied powers/abilities at any time. Not to mention the enjoyment whilst playing as survivor. Playing with friends causes tears from pure laughter more often than not and now, with the addition of cross play, has become the centre of gaming for me and connecting with friends! However there are some issues that have consistently been in the game such as toxic players, trash hitboxes (that are being worked on) and quite a few fun-ruining bugs (although space billy is awesome...devs pls don't fix). I believe the game is in the best position that it has been in the 3 and a half years of me owning the game, and if you are considering buying it, I 110% recommend you do so!

Hru jsem si koupil, vyzkoušel a totálně mě nebavila, načež jsem jí dlouhé měsíce, ne-li roky nehrál a přehlížel, Po "letech" jsem ji opět oprášil, no a doslova mě pohltila. Je bláznivé jak tahle hra dokáže skloubit a nabídnout v jeden moment kopec zábavy a strachu najednou. Jsou ve hře totiž takový vrahové ze kterých jde vážně mráz po zádech a když se k tomu přidá váš kamarád, který u hry piští jak malé děcko kterému se dostal šampón do očí a ještě vám podělá celou hru, jednoduše protože je to vocas a aby toho nebylo málo, tak vám jde po krku killer který už předem ví moc dobře co udělá s vaším tělem, tak tomu pak říkám "jiná a slušná porce zábavy".
Nejvíce mě šokuje (pozitivně), že ač se ve hře odehrává stále to samé dokola, tak právě slušným počtem "přeživších" a "killerů" se hra mění kus od kusu a stále dokáže bavit na dlouhé hodiny.
Graficky se mi hra také líbí, zvuky, hudba a celé hororové prostředí je dechberoucí a opravdu věrohodné. A jak je u mě zvykem tak jediné co mi na hře trochu kazí celkový dojem dokonalosti je chybějící čeština (proto hraju s kámošem, co umí anglicky i prdět) :D
[b] Zkrátka hru doporučuji všemi deseti ;) [/b]

mommy like

Dead by Daylight is amazing game with friends. Whether you are working as a 4 stack as survivors or queuing as killer as friends, it's an amazing game. The number of fun killers with varying play styles, making the games very interesting and never boring. Most players you meet are also very nice, not toxic or trying to one up everyone for some idea of rank.

However, I must say, this game does have it's small problems with ping, but the development team is working on fixing this problem. Plus, for some new players, it is very difficult to learn skills, killers, and what they would most likely see in game, however, with how friendly the community can be, it is easy to get high skill level players to teach help teach the new players.

All in all, I give this game a very solid review:
Pros:
- Very positive community
- Grand array of play styles and playable killers/survivors
- Great development team and flow of new content coming in and out

Cons
- Slight server issues 
- Ping against survivors and killers
- Very long queue times for killers

I recommend this game for people who love horror classics, hunter vs hunted or ever changing matches.
